text: Need Peyton Stewart for Witchery campaign. Budget around $9,680, looking for 3 x Instagram story, 3 x Instagram reel, 1 x 90-second product demo. 12 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 6 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $9,680 budget
